import React from 'react' import Header from './Header' import Main from './Main' import Footer from './Footer' import PopupWithForm from './PopupWithForm' import ImagePopup from './ImagePopup' class App extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) let isEditProfilePopupOpen = false let isAddPlacePopupOpen = false let isEditAvatarPopupOpen = false } handleEditAvatarClick = () => { document.querySelector('.popup_type_change-avatar').classList.add('popup_opened') } handleEditProfileClick = () => { document.querySelector('.popup_type_edit-profile').classList.add('popup_opened') } handleAddPlaceClick = () => { document.querySelector('.popup_type_add-place').classList.add('popup_opened') } closeAllPopups = () => { } render() { return (
); } } export default App;
